name: Documentarian
description:
A journey to find an enigmatic man who sought to film the perfect documentary, but was lost in his own perfectionism along the way. A deadly cycle for many artists.

----------------------------------

This game was made for the "I Can't Draw But I Want To Make A Game (again)" Jam.

Definitely has some issues, but i'm glad to finally be out of my slump. The "game" deals with creative struggles, so its fitting.


Thank you for playing. It means the world to me.
